'''2.1.17784''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and [[MCD:Launcher|Dungeons]]), '''2.1.17783''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.17785''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on October 20, 2020.

== Changes ==
* Enabled IPv6 support.
* Improved DNS resolution stability.
* Updated UI dependencies.
* Accessibility improvements.
